data.description: The application of theoretically and academically acquired knowledge to a civil and environmental engineering problem in as near "real-world" as possible.
data.title: SENIOR CAPSTONE DESIGN

data.description: Basic concepts in designing, evaluating, and operating solid wastes storage, collection, and disposal systems; waste reduction, resource recovery, incineration and land disposal methods; hazardous wastes engineering; legal, political, and administrative considerations.
data.title: SOLID AND HAZARDOUS WASTES ENGINEERING

data.description: Preliminary studies and design of water treatment processes and subordinate plant facilities; project control of design project; unit operations in water treatment; groundwater treatment; preliminary cost estimates; introduction of computer-aided design concept; site visits to water treatment plants.
data.title: WATER TREATMENT PLANT DESIGN
